https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4JvuAZk5eGdeVU3lgGGJkcQ1z4r.jpg In the near future, all teachers give lectures in front of an empty classroom and a simple webcam, broadcasting their lesson over the internet. An history teacher is about to see his daily routine shaken up... As It Used To Be
